    • Constructor Detail

      • Voting_System

        public Voting_System​(java.lang.String votetype,
                     int totalballot,
                     int totalcandidate)
        Generates Voting_System instance and runs the voting system.
        Parameters:
        votetype - String type, the type of the election, IR or OPL.
        totalballot - integer type, the total number of votes received for the election.
        totalcandidate - integer type, the total number of candidates joined the election.
        Throws:
        no - exception.
